doc.after: The fa a Samoa or traditional Samoan way remains a strong force in Samoan life and politics Despite centuries of European influence Samoa maintains its historical customs social and political systems and language Cultural customs such as the Samoa ava ceremony are significant and solemn rituals at important occasions including the bestowal of matai chiefly titles Items of great cultural value include the finely woven ie toga
